channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager

item.title: CVE-2020-4445|2024-09-17T03:23:17.602Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server based Applications are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 181122.

item.title: CVE-2020-4525|2024-09-17T02:51:30.204Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182435.

item.title: CVE-2020-4396|2024-09-17T03:18:48.304Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. item.title: CVE-2017-1245|2024-09-17T00:41:34.248Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Software Architect Design Manager 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124580.

item.title: CVE-2017-1249|2024-09-17T01:01:34.539Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1559|2024-09-17T03:08:04.912Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: Multiple IBM Rational products could disclose sensitive information by an attacker that intercepts vulnerable requests. IBM X-Force ID: 131758.

item.title: CVE-2017-1509|2024-09-17T01:31:15.085Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from a stack trace that could be used to aid future attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 129719.

This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.
